subject: Re: Gifts in Wills booklet and form to be updated on the website
preview: Hi Trish, Regarding the PDF showing as singles versus double page spreads, this is default web browser behaviour. It's to allow the PDF to be best read on smaller devices. If you want it to appear as

full_threads.body:
Hi Trish, 

Regarding the PDF showing as singles versus double page spreads, this is default web browser behaviour. It's to allow the PDF to be best read on smaller devices. If you want it to appear as spreads, the artwork would need to be redesigned to effectively have 2 portrait pages of content on a single landscape page and then exported out. Hope that makes sense? 

Regarding the email trigger, there is not one for the user, only your internal address Nicki@ receives a notification. This is to ensure the user has to enter their details to see the content, otherwise they could circumvent the form submission and Google would index the page etc. 

The alternative is to send them a link via email, the only downside of this is that it becomes very easy to forward on and share. Let me know?

Hi Heath

Can I also please ask why the PDF document is appearing as single pages and not the double page spreads? If possible I would prefer it to display as per the document that I sent through to you.

Also was there meant to be an email trigger to the person downloading the document i.e. I have done two tests, the download page is unlocked but I did not receive an email with the URL link. How do I navigate to that page again if I want to ??

Thanks

Trish



Petricia Augustus

Head of Communications, Marketing and Operations

MS Research Australia

02 8413 7910 • 1300 356 467

paugustus@msra.org.au • http://www.msra.org.au/

Hi Trish, 

Sure, confirming we have now updated that link too: https://msra.org.au/ways-to-donate/gifts-in-wills/ - speak soon.

Hi Heath

In addition can I please get the link change at the top of the page, where it says ask for your free brochure can you please change it from an email link to have it go to the form.

Thanks

Trish

Thank you for updating the form and adding the brochure.

Can I please ask why the PDF document is appearing as single pages and not the double page spreads? If possible I would prefer it to display as per the document that I sent through to you.

Also was there meant to be an email trigger to the person downloading the document i.e. I have done two tests, the download page is unlocked but I did not receive an email with the URL link. How do I navigate to that page again if I want to ??

Hi Trish, 

Ok thanks for this, we have now set it up with the brochure and changes. 

Heres is the link: https://msra.org.au/ways-to-donate/gifts-in-wills

To answer your questions:

  1. Nicki will receive a notification for each submission
  2. The entries are stored here: https://msra.org.au/wp-admin/admin.php?page=gf_entries&id=22
  3. The goal is setup in Google Analytics

Hi Heath

Lizzy just mentioned to me the following:

  1. The form submission needs to always trigger an email to Nicki directly with the info the person put in the form.

  2. We need to know where the form submissions are to be found in the back-end.

  3. Can we set up goal conversion in Google Analytics for form submissions on this page and if so how?




Thanks

Trish







Petricia Augustus

Hi Heath


Great news, our Gift in Wills book has been finalised (attached).


Please can you update the following page https://msra.org.au/ways-to-donate/gifts-in-wills/

  • Please change the form;

Update form so it is a brochure download form instead…

Title: Get your brochure
Intro copy: Simply submit your details below to download a copy of our Gift in Wills brochure.

Field 1 (compulsory): First Name
Field 2 (compulsory): Last Name
Field 3 (compulsory): email address
Field 4 (optional): phone
Button: Download brochure


  • Can I also please check what you have put in place for the download process? If you could advise and implement asap. I am sure that Lizzy would have asked for this to have been setup and also ensure that we have tracking in place for it. Apologies for not being across this. Lizzy is flat out working on another job, so I am just trying to help to get this across the line as fast as possible.

Feel free to call me if it's easier to explain.

Thanks
Trish
Petricia Augustus
